plot: Documents a workday at a remote Chinese oil field, from a stolen nap in a break room to the massive drills plunging into the earth.
title: Caiyou riji
plot_es: Documents a workday at a remote Chinese oil field, from a stolen nap in a break room to the massive drills plunging into the earth.
plot_en: Documents a workday at a remote Chinese oil field, from a stolen nap in a break room to the massive drills plunging into the earth.
